column2: First restraunt in Athens that I went to. Greek salad was amazing as well as the mains. Great proportions and kind waiters. You will leave satisfied.
Great food with generous portion. Ordered one salad, two mains and left very full and satisfied. Make sure you ask and they will explain the menu very well and what to try.

Great museum with great location and set up. Make sure you start from the top floor and watch a breif introduction video before exploring this wonderful museum. I wish i visited the museum before going upto acropolis as i would have appreciated the site much more

I cqnnot believe this was built more than 2000 years ago. It is still very well preserved and offers great view of the whole athen city. Go early or go late. At 9 am, all the tour groups will start to arrive. Book tickets online from official site which is very easy to do and download it on your phone. Dont need to print it.
Food expensive, drinks also. But you pay for the view. Staff service can be slow but they are friendly.
I liked white wine more than red wine. Food was average. Cheese was great. Balsamic was amazing. Price is at least 28euro a bottle

Ordered 1 kg T bone steak. The fillet part of the steak is the best I have ever had in my life by far. It was beautiful. High quality steak that was cooked perfectly. I cannot describe it well. You just have to try it. To finish off, you have to order tiramisu and coffee. Tiramisu was so fresh. Service was quick and attentive.
Rude staff, average food, overpriced. My first time leaving a bad review. One of the staff actually shouted at an old couple next to us. That's the service you will get for 50-100 euro dinner.

Arrived at 320pm, got a number from the front, got into the place at 4pm, served at 420pm. Ordered margarita and marinara (the only choices). Only thing special about the pizza was its base. Never had pizza base that is chewy. Did not find it impressive at first, but now i keep thinking about it. It is one special pizza base.

While i am writing this review, lying down on bed, i can hear the live music from the street and its 10pm already. I am going to drink one more beer before passing out listening to this live street performance. It is truely a magical place.
Opened til late, nice lady. Tried some desert on the side fridge which was ok. Will try gelato tomorrow
